name: paystack-openapi
description: The OpenAPI specification for the Paystack API
author: Damilola Odujoko

scripts.bundle:usecases: pnpm bundle:wallet && pnpm bundle:membership && pnpm bundle:marketplace && pnpm bundle:betting && pnpm bundle:lending && pnpm bundle:savings
scripts.sdk:python:generate: pnpm sdk:sync-spec && docker run --rm -u $(id -u):$(id -g) -v "$PWD:/local" openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:latest generate -g python -i /local/src/assets/sdk/paystack.yaml -o /local/sdks/python -c /local/sdks/python/openapi-generator-config.yaml --skip-validate-spec --global-property apis,models,supportingFiles,modelDocs=false,apiDocs=false,apiTests=false,modelTests=false && pnpm sdk:readmes:postprocess
scripts.sdk:php:generate: pnpm sdk:sync-spec && docker run --rm -u $(id -u):$(id -g) -v "$PWD:/local" openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:latest generate -g php -i /local/src/assets/sdk/paystack.yaml -o /local/sdks/php -c /local/sdks/php/openapi-generator-config.yaml --skip-validate-spec --global-property apis,models,supportingFiles,modelDocs=false,apiDocs=false,apiTests=false,modelTests=false && pnpm sdk:php:postprocess && pnpm sdk:readmes:postprocess
scripts.sdk:go:generate: pnpm sdk:sync-spec && node scripts/clean-go-sdk-output.mjs && docker run --rm -u $(id -u):$(id -g) -v "$PWD:/local" openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:latest generate -g go -i /local/src/assets/sdk/paystack.yaml -o /local/sdks/go -c /local/sdks/go/openapi-generator-config.yaml --skip-validate-spec --global-property apis,models,supportingFiles,modelDocs=false,apiDocs=false,apiTests=false,modelTests=false && pnpm sdk:readmes:postprocess
scripts.sdk:others:generate: pnpm sdk:python:generate && pnpm sdk:php:generate && pnpm sdk:go:generate
